short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disposable Mailbox is a free temporary email service that creates an email address that self-deletes after 30 minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disposable Mailbox is a free temporary email service that allows you to receive email at a temporary address that self-deletes after 30 minutes. Disposable Mailbox is also known to called names like: tempmail, throwaway email, burner email, fake-mail, fake email generator, burner email or trash-mail.
